item.title: Helpful Filesystem Tips
item.description: Helpful Filesystem Tips change reserved space on ext4 partitions to zero. Useful for drives specifically for data storage and no system recovery needed. # tune2fs -m 0 /dev/sdb1 print UUID of filesystems # blkid remount a readonly filesystem to rewrite # mount -o remount,rw / watch the status of dd (useful on systems without "status=progress", like Mac I think)
